description:
The Brazilian Report on Tuesday won the 2024 Digiday Media Award for Best Story for “The plan to hack Brazil’s chief electoral justice,” a scoop published in February 2023. Other 2024 Digiday winners include TIME magazine, which won both Media Brand of the Year and Content Studio of the Year for its Red Border branded […]

The post The Brazilian Report wins Best Story in Digiday Media Awards  appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
title: The Brazilian Report wins Best Story in Digiday Media Awards

title: Brazil’s Central Bank doubles down on slowing rate cuts

description:
While Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil’s southernmost state, is ravaged by floods, red flags have been raised in Maranhão, a northeastern state 4,000 kilometers away. Heavier-than-expected rainfall led city administrations to declare a state of emergency, as floods and storms have affected 4,000 people (with one casualty) across 31 municipalities, including the state capital, São Luís. […]

The post Maranhão, in Brazil’s Northeast, is also worried about the risk of floods appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
title: Maranhão, in Brazil’s Northeast, is also worried about the risk of floods

description:
Changes in rainfall patterns "may be due to human-driven climate change, with a minor contribution from natural variability"

The post Human-driven climate change is the culprit for Brazil’s floods appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
title: Human-driven climate change is the culprit for Brazil’s floods
